SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SCH_INCU.PROJECT WHERE LAST_CHNG_ID = #{userEmail} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
AND PROJECT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchProjectName}, '%')
AND DATE(FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM) >= CAST(#{searchStartDate} AS DATE)
AND DATE(FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM) <= CAST(#{searchEndDate} AS DATE)
AND EVA_CD = #{searchEvaCd}

SELECT A.PROJECT_ID AS projectId, A.PROJECT_NAME AS projectName, A.EVA_CD AS evaCd, A.SCORE_FIN AS scoreFin, A.EVA_START_DT AS evaStartDt, A.EVA_END_DT AS evaEndDt, A.USER_GROUP_ID AS userGroupId, A.EVA_GROUP_ID AS evaGroupId, A.PROJECT_DETAIL AS projectDetail, A.URL AS url, A.FILE_PATH AS filePath, B.ATTACHMENT_ID AS attachmentId, B.ATTACHMENT_NAME AS attachmentName, A.DEL_YN AS delYn, A.FRST_RGSR_ID AS frstRgsrId, A.FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM AS frstRgsrDtlDttm, A.LAST_CHNG_ID AS lastChngId, A.LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM AS lastChngDtlDttm FROM SCH_INCU.PROJECT A LEFT JOIN SCH_INCU.ATTACHMENT B ON A.PROJECT_ID = B.PROJECT_ID AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE A.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
